nodes.documentation:
<summary>
 Creates a new puzzle with given metrics.
 </summary>
nodes.name: CreatePuzzle

nodes.documentation:
<summary>
 Pushes metrics for the given puzzle.
 </summary>
nodes.name: PushMetrics

nodes.documentation:
<summary>
 Compares the metrics associated to this address to the
 original metrics, for the given puzzle id.
 </summary>
nodes.name: CompareMetrics

nodes.documentation:
<summary>
 Returns the original metrics associated to a given puzzle id.
 </summary>
nodes.name: GetPuzzleOriginalMetrics
